plugins\/homebridge\/plugin_info\/config.Fonctionne uniquement pour ajouter Jeedo: Work only for adding Jeedom, for third parties platforms, use the PIN
plugins\/homebridge\/plugin_info\/config.(Aucun Support) Fonctionne seulement pou: (No Support) Work only for Temperature, Humidity, Pressure, Door/Window, Presence.  Graphs have been developped using Reverse Engineering some of Elgato Eve components, some glitches may appears. Graphs datas are collected when the Homebridge Daemon is started, some information may be missing. Graphs are only for info purpose.
plugins\/homebridge\/plugin_info\/config.Configuration avancée, à vos propres ris: Advanced Configuration, use at your own risks !!! No support will be given !!!
plugins\/homebridge\/plugin_info\/config.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir réparer Homebri: Are you sure to repair Homebridge ? You have to uninstall Jeedom from your iOS devices (Thank you to delete the Jeedom Gateway from the Home app).
plugins\/homebridge\/plugin_info\/config.Réparation Homebridge effectuée, merci d: Homebridge Repair done, thank you for waiting for daemon start
plugins\/homebridge\/plugin_info\/config.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer et re: Are you sure to delete and repair Homebridge ? You have to uninstall Jeedom from your iOS devices (Thank you to delete the Jeedom Gateway from the Home app).
plugins\/homebridge\/plugin_info\/config.Réinstallation Homebridge effectuée, mer: Homebridge Reinstall done, thank you for waiting for the end of dependancies install

plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/pla.!!! Cette configuration est en mode avan: !!! This configuration is advanced !!! use at your own risks !!! no support will be given !!!
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/pla.Le contenu doit être un objet JSON de ty: The content have to be a platform type JSON object
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/pla.Si de multiples plateformes, les séparer: If multi platform, use | (pipe) to separate them
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/pla.le plugin homebridge correspondant doit: the homebridge plugin have to be installed with npm (homebridge-camera-ffmpeg is already installed and uses avconv or ffmpeg if it exists)
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/pla.NB : Une nouvelle Plateforme doit être a: Note : A new Platform have to be added as a new accessory in Home (using the same PIN code)

Configuration Save done. Restart the daemon

plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Cliquez sur un équipement pour voir ses: Click on the Equipment name to see the Generic Types
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Personnalisation des états, indiquez ici: Status Customization, please enter the value of the status linked to the action type
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Merci de vider les valeurs que vous n'ut: Thank you to empty the unused values (not zero, empty !)
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Si vous avez des boutons multiples, sépa: If you have multiple buttons, please separate values with ';', the number of ';' MUST be the same for each event (even if you have to type ';;;')
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Groupement des évenements par bouton, ce: Group events by button, this event belong to :
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Si vous laissez \"Un bouton séparé\", il: If you leave "A separate button", only one button with one event will be created
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Un seul type d'évenement (Simple, Double: Only one event type (Simple, Double, Long) for each button
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/obj.Merci de ne pas choisir plusieurs fois l: Thank you for not using the same mode several times

plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/acc.!!! Cette configuration est en mode avan: !!! This configuration is advanced mode !!! use at your own risks !!! no support will be given !!!
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/acc.Le contenu doit être un objet JSON de ty: The content have to be an accessory type JSON object
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/acc.Si de multiples accessoires, les séparer: If multi accessories, separate them with | (pipe)
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/acc.le plugin homebridge correspondant doit: the matching homebridge-plugin should be installed with npm
plugins\/homebridge\/desktop\/modal\/acc.NB : Un nouvel Accessoire doit être ajou: Note : the new Accessory have to be added to the Home app with the same PIN code

Configuration saved successfully. Restart the daemon
